additionalDetails.description: If Furious Axe hits, you strike for +5...29...35 damage. If it is blocked you gain 3 strikes worth of adrenaline.
If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...17...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.
Lose all adrenaline. If Final Thrust hits, you deal 1...32...40 more damage. This damage is doubled if your target was below 50% Health.
If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.
If Renewing Smash hits, it deals +10...34...40 damage.  If you hit a knocked-down foe, you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.

For 5...10...11 seconds, while wielding a shield, the next attack skill used against you is blocked. If it was a melee skill, your attacker is knocked down and that skill is disabled for an additional 15 seconds.
If you hit a knocked-down foe, that foe suffers from Weakness and a Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds.
If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...29...34 damage.
For each foe within earshot (maximum 1...5...6), you gain one strike of adrenaline.  For 10...18...20 seconds, your maximum Health is increased by 10...50...60.
For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Berserker Stance ends if you use a skill.
If this attack hits you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If Seeking Blade is blocked, your target begins Bleeding for 25 seconds and takes 1...16...20 damage.
For 30 seconds, your animal companion has a 33% faster attack speed and moves 33% faster.
For 5 seconds, your attack rate is increased by 33%, but you deal 25% less damage.
Gain 1...6...7 strike[s] of adrenaline. For 10 seconds, whenever you use an adrenal skill, that skill recharges for 5 seconds.
For 1...8...10 second[s], you run 33% faster. Your next successful melee hit does +10...34...40 damage and this stance ends. This stance ends if you use a skill.
All of your signets are disabled for 12 seconds. You are healed for 50...98...110 Health, and gain 0...2...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.
For 7...16...18 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health.
All of your attack skills become recharged. You gain 2...6...7 Energy for each skill recharged by Flourish.
If there are any dead allies within earshot, your party moves 33% faster for 5...10...11 seconds.
If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you deal 1...32...40 extra damage.
For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.
For 20 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health, an additional 20 armor, and you take -1...8...10 less damage.
If you have less Health than your pet, you are healed for 30...102...120 Health. If your pet has less Health than you, it is healed for 30...102...120 Health.

Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Bleeding creatures within its range suffer -2 Health degeneration. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit creatures within its range that have less than 90% Health begin Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Drunken Blow, you are knocked down.
For 8...18...20 seconds, you move 25% faster.
For 1...5...6 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks while under the effects of a shout or chant. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each blocked attack.
Party members within earshot gain +5...21...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 10 incoming attacks.

You heal your animal companion for 20...87...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...48...58% Health. If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.
For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. You gain 5 Energy for each successful melee attack blocked. Bonetti's Defense ends if you use a skill.

For 1...4...5 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. When Defensive Stance ends, you gain one strike of adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0...3...4).
For 5...25...30 seconds, your Traps recharge 25% faster and activate 25% faster. This Stance ends if you successfully hit with an attack.
If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...29...34 damage.
For 4...9...10 seconds, you attack 33% faster. Tiger Stance ends if any of your attacks fail to hit.
Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For each enchantment on a non-spirit creature within range, that creature has +27...125...150 maximum Health. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.
If this attack hits, target foe takes +10...34...40 damage. If target foe has Cracked Armor, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 0...12...15 second[s].
For 5...10...11 seconds, you and all party members within earshot gain +60 armor against incoming projectile attacks.
Interrupt target foe's action.  If that action was an attack, all of that foe's attack skills are disabled for 0...2...3 second[s].
For 2...8...10 seconds, you attack 33% faster. When this stance ends, you lose all adrenaline.
For 1...3...4 second[s], you gain +10 armor and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Disciplined Stance ends if you use an adrenal skill.
Target touched foe takes 40...88...100 damage. You are Dazed for 5...17...20 seconds.
Your animal companion attempts a Disrupting Lunge that deals +1...10...12 damage. If that attack strikes a foe using a skill that skill is interrupted and is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
For 5 seconds, all allies within earshot move 10% faster. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each ally affected.

Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all healing is reduced by 20%. If any of your attacks hit, you gain 5 Health. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.
For 8...18...20 seconds, you cannot be knocked down and you do not suffer extra damage from a critical attack.
If this attack hits, you deal +5...25...30 damage. If you are currently not in a stance, you also inflict Bleeding for 5...13...15 seconds.
For 5...29...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. Warrior's Endurance cannot raise your Energy above 10...22...25.
Allies in earshot lose the Crippled condition. For 5...11...13 seconds, these allies move 33% faster.
If this attack hits, you deal +12 damage for each signet you have equipped (maximum 70 damage).
For 10...22...25 seconds, your animal companion gains +24 armor and cannot be blocked.
For 5...13...15 seconds, you move 25% faster. Enraging Charge ends when you successfully strike a target, at which point you gain 0...2...3 strike[s] of adrenaline if you hit with a melee attack.
If this attack hits, you strike for +10...26...30 damage and cause Burning for 1...6...7 seconds.
Lose all adrenaline. Attack all adjacent foes. If this attack strikes a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)
For 1...5...6 second[s], while wielding a shield, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks, and damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction).
For 5...10...11 seconds, if you are wielding a hammer, you attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt foes when they hit.
For 8...18...20 seconds, you have +10...34...40 armor and cannot be knocked down, but your movement is slowed by 75%.
You have +50...250...300 maximum Health. This signet ends if you successfully hit with an attack.
If this attack strikes a moving foe, you strike for 10...34...40 more damage.
For 20 seconds, whenever you gain adrenaline, you gain 100% more.
If this attack hits, you strike for +5...29...35 damage. If you hit an attacking foe, you gain 2...5...6 Energy.
For 5...10...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and if you strike a moving foe in melee, that foe is knocked down. Bull's Charge ends if you use a skill.
If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that foe was casting a spell, that foe is Dazed for 10 seconds.
Swipe your weapon at the target, dealing no damage but disrupting the target's current action (and the actions of foes adjacent to your target).
Shoot an arrow that has half the normal range, but strikes for +10...34...40 damage.
Your next 1...13...16 attack[s] deal +5 damage.
If this attack hits, you deal +10...34...40 more damage. If you are under the effects of a chant or shout, this attack cannot be blocked.
Your animal companion attempts a Predator's Pounce that deals +5...29...35 damage. If that attack hits, your animal companion gains 5...41...50 Health.
Create a level 1...8...10 spirit.  For non-spirit creatures within its range, arrows move twice as fast and strike for +6 damage.  This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.
If this blow hits, you deal +20...36...40 damage. If you have more Health than target foe, you gain 1...2...2 strike[s] of adrenaline.
Your animal companion attempts a Maiming Strike that deals +5...17...20 damage. If that attack hits a moving foe that foe becomes Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds.
Target touched foe and foes adjacent to your target become Blinded for 3...13...15 seconds.
If this attack hits, you deal +1...16...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe is Dazed for 1...7...8 second[s].
Your animal companion attempts a Feral Lunge that deals +5...29...35 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is attacking, that foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds.
If target foe is moving, that foe is knocked down.
If Jaizhenju Strike hits, you strike for +1...24...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Jaizhenju Strike cannot be blocked.
For 1...5...6 second[s], you block any attack skills used against you. For each successful block, you gain adrenaline and 5 Energy. Wary Stance ends if you use a skill.
Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Pounce that deals +5...17...20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.
Your animal companion attempts a Brutal Strike that deals +5...29...35 damage. If that attack strikes a foe whose Health is below 50%, that foe takes an additional +5...29...35 damage.
If Distracting Strike hits, it deals no damage and interrupts target foe's action. If target foe has Cracked Armor, that skill is disabled for 20 seconds.
For 5...10...11 seconds, allies adjacent to you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Protector's Defense ends if you move.
If this attack hits, you deal +1...25...31 damage. If you hit a foe that is knocked down, you gain 1...4...5 adrenaline.
For 15 seconds, you and all adjacent allies deal 25 damage to all adjacent foes each second.
If Quivering Blade hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, that foe is Dazed for 5 seconds.

Create a level 1...5...6 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all skills cost 15 less Energy (minimum cost 10 Energy), and skills recharge 25% slower. This spirit dies after 1...25...31 second[s].
If target foe isn't near an ally, that foe suffers from Cripple and Weakness for 8 seconds.
Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Mauling that deals  +5...17...20 damage. If the attack strikes a knocked-down foe, that foe is Dazed for 4...9...10 seconds.
For 5...17...20 seconds, your pet attacks 33% faster and deals +3...9...10 additional damage.
For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Whenever you block a melee attack this way, the attacker suffers 5...29...35 damage.
If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds, losing Health over time.
If this attack hits, target foe is Crippled for 5...13...15 seconds and begins Bleeding for 10...22...25 seconds.
For 10 seconds, the next time you would be knocked down, you gain 1...3...3 strike[s] of adrenaline and 1...6...7 Energy instead.
If this attack hits, your target is Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds, slowing his[sic] movement.
If it hits, Standing Slash deals +5...17...20 damage plus an additional 5...17...20 damage if you are in a stance.
For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you, and your attacker is struck for 15...75...90 damage and begins Bleeding for 3...21...25 seconds.
For each dead ally, you gain 10 seconds of +3...6...7 Health regeneration and your attack speed increases by 25%.
For 5...13...15 seconds, you and your pet run 25% faster.
If Pure Strike hits, you strike for +1...24...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Pure Strike cannot be blocked.
If this attack hits, you deal +5...17...20 damage. If it hits a foe with Cracked Armor, you gain 5...9...10 Energy.
For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 33% faster. This stance ends if you use an attack skill.
For 3...15...18 seconds, you move 15% faster. You move an additional 15% faster while under the effects of a chant or shout.
If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.
Lose all adrenaline. If any adjacent foes are knocked down, all of your stances are recharged.
For 15 seconds, whenever you attack with a sword, all adjacent foes take 10...22...25 slashing damage.
For 1...12...15 second[s], you attack 33% faster but move 33% slower.
For 120 seconds, your animal companion has a 5...17...20 base damage reduction.
For 8 seconds, the next attack against you is blocked. You gain 1...3...4 strike[s] of adrenaline when this stance ends.
You and target touched foe are knocked down. You lose your current stance.
For 5...13...15 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.
All nearby foes that are moving are knocked down. This skill recharges 1...7...8 second[s] faster for each foe knocked down (maximum 25 seconds).

Your animal companion instantly moves to your target and causes Bleeding for 5...13...15 seconds with its next attack. The next time you hit with an attack, target foe is Crippled for 5...13...15 seconds.
If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 1...3...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.
All nearby foes lose 1...3...4 Energy. For 1...12...15 second[s], your melee attacks gain +5...25...30% chance of a critical hit against stationary foes.
Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that applies a Deep Wound to target foe for 5...17...20 seconds and deals +10...42...50 damage.
For 1...5...6 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks. If you block a projectile attack, adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding for 5...13...15 seconds.

For 15 seconds, your animal companion steals 1...16...20 Health whenever it hits with an attack. You and your companion are both healed for 20...87...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it's resurrected with 50% Health. If you have this skill equipped, your companion will travel with you.
Attack target foe twice. These attacks cannot be blocked.
All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.
This attack strikes for +1...32...40 damage if it hits.
You gain 82...154...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage, and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Desperation Blow, you are knocked down.
This attack strikes for +1...32...40 damage if it hits.
For 5...10...11 seconds, your melee attacks cannot be blocked.
If this hammer blow hits, your target will suffer from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.
You gain 10...56...68 Health and 3...6...7 Energy for each condition suffered by target foe.
If this attack hits a moving foe, you strike for +5...25...30 damage, and your target is knocked down.
If Concussion Shot hits while target foe is casting a spell, the spell is interrupted and your target is Dazed for 5...17...20 seconds.  This attack deals only 1...13...16 damage.
Your animal companion attempts a Ferocious Strike that deals  +13...25...28 damage. If that attack hits, you gain adrenaline and 3...9...10 Energy.
Your animal companion attempts a Melandru's Assault that deals +5...17...20 damage to all nearby foes.
For 8...13...14 seconds, you move 25% faster.
If this attack hits a Crippled foe, you gain 2...6...7 Energy and 1...3...3 strikes [sic] of adrenaline.

When Flame Trap is triggered, every second (for 3 seconds total), all nearby foes are struck for 5...17...20 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s]. Flame Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
For 8 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks, but take double damage.
Target touched foe is knocked down. If that foe was moving, that foe's stance ends and that foe takes 15...63...75 damage before being knocked down.
Create a level 1...8...10 Spirit. For non-Spirit creatures within its range, Signets cost 10 Energy to use. This Spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.
For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you and your attacker is struck for 20...68...80 damage.
For 4...9...10 seconds, target ally's attacks cannot be blocked.
If Dragon Slash hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage and gain 1...4...5 strike[s] of adrenaline.
For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks, and you attack 33% faster.
Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.
Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range have +50...130...150 maximum Health and gain +8 armor. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

Needling Shot strikes for only 10...26...30 damage and moves faster than normal.  If Needling Shot strikes a foe below 50% Health, Needling Shot recharges instantly. Your other attack skills are disabled for 2 seconds.

Create a level 1...16...20 spirit. This spirit heals all party members within earshot for 3...9...10 Health each second. This spirit loses 3...9...10 Health for each party member healed in this way. This spirit dies after 30...78...90 seconds.

Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. If a non-spirit creature within range dies, Edge of Extinction deals 14...43...50 damage to all creatures of the same type that are below 90% Health and within range of the spirit. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.
Target ally is healed for 10...82...100 Health. If you are holding an item, you gain 3 Energy.
For 5...17...20 seconds, spells you cast while within earshot of a spirit recharge 25% faster.

Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. All non-spirit foes knocked down within its range are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. Whenever this happens, this spirit loses 50...30...25 Health. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.
For 5...17...20 seconds, all spirits you control within earshot attack 33% faster and deal 5...9...10 additional damage.
If target foe is Burning, you gain 5...13...15 Energy.
For 10...30...35 seconds, your spirits within earshot take 50% less damage and are immune to critical attacks.
Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. All foes within its range take twice as long to build adrenaline. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.
Target foe is struck for 20...56...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit, that foe is Blinded for 2...5...6 seconds.
Target ally is healed for 15...63...75 Health. If that ally is under the effects of a weapon spell, that ally loses one condition.
Give target ally a Brutal Weapon for 10...34...40 seconds. The bearer's weapon strikes for +5...13...15 damage as long as the bearer is under no enchantments.

Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. This spirit causes 3...9...10 Health loss each second to foes within earshot. This spirit loses 3...9...10 Health for each foe hurt in this way. This spirit dies after 30...78...90 seconds.
For 5...17...20 seconds, you have  +1...3...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 8) on you.
Hold Songkai's ashes for up to 45 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your spells and binding rituals cost -5...41...50% of the base Energy to cast.
Strike target foe for 10...34...40 lightning (maximum 135) damage for every recharging binding ritual you have.
Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. This spirit deals 5...17...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack is interrupted. This spirit dies after 10...22...25 seconds.
Lose half your Health. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 5...17...20% Energy.
For 15 seconds, target non-spirit ally has +2...3...3 Health regeneration. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
For 5...17...20 seconds, all allies within earshot move 25% faster while under the effects of an enchantment.
Hold Tanasen's ashes for up to 5...17...20 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you have +10...22...25 armor and cannot be interrupted.
Hold Vorizun's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.
Hold Tsungrai's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds and gain +50...122...140 maximum Health. When you drop his ashes, you gain 100...244...280 Health.
Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. The spirit's attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and cause Blindness for 1...5...6 second[s]. This spirit dies after 30 second[s].

Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit allies within its range are healed for 1...6...7 Health for each second this spirit was alive. This spirit dies after 20 seconds.
For 5...37...45 seconds, your Binding Rituals cost 15 less Energy (minimum 10) and recharge instantly. Soul Twisting ends after 1...3...3 Binding Ritual[s].
Hold Li Ming's ashes for 5...17...20 seconds. While you hold her ashes, conditions on you expire 10...42...50% faster. When you drop her ashes, all allies within earshot lose 1...3...4 condition[s].

When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes are Blinded for 1...6...7 second[s]. For 30 seconds, if you are wielding an earth weapon, your melee attacks deal +3...13...15 earth damage. When this enchantment ends, you are cured of Blindness.
For 10...18...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Painful Bond and take 8...18...20 damage whenever hit by a spirit's attack.
For 15...51...60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, you gain 5...41...50 Health and 1...5...6 Energy.
You gain 15...75...90 Health. For 1...8...10 seconds, other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster.
For 5...17...20 seconds, target other ally's next attack cannot be blocked.
For 3...9...11 seconds, target ally moves 25% faster. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
For 3...8...9 seconds, target ally has a Wailing Weapon. Whenever the Wailing Weapon strikes an attacking foe, that foe is interrupted.
For 5...17...20 seconds, target other ally moves 33% faster.  This skill ends if that ally successfully hits with an attack.
For 5...17...20 seconds, while holding an item, any weapon and item Spells you cast cost 5...29...35% less Energy.
The spirit nearest you loses 5...41...50 Health. Target ally is healed for 5 for each point of Health lost.
For each nearby ally, you gain 2 Energy (maximum 8...11...12 Energy).
All nearby foes begin Bleeding for 5...13...15 seconds. For 30 seconds, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Crippled for 3...7...8 seconds.
For 5...21...25 seconds, you attack 25% faster but have -20 armor. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on you.
For 10 seconds, the next Shout or Chant used by each ally within earshot costs 3...6...7 less Energy.
For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot takes damage, that party member gains 15...63...75 Health.
For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a spell, that party member gains 30...78...90 Health.
Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. When this spirit dies, all party members in the area are resurrected with 5...41...50% Health and zero Energy. This spirit dies after 30 seconds.
If it hits, this attack deals 10...50...60 holy damage. It deals double damage to summoned creatures.

Hold Lingwah's ashes for up to 10...50...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your Ritualist hexes cost 1...4...5 less energy and last 33% longer. When you drop her ashes all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.
For 5...17...20 seconds, all party members within earshot receive +24 armor when not moving.
For 20 seconds, the next 1...3...3 skill[s] used by each ally within earshot remove 1 condition from that ally.
For 4...9...10 seconds, each party member within earshot has a 50% chance to block incoming attacks. This chant ends if that party member hits with an attack skill.
Target allied spirit is destroyed. All nearby enemies are struck for 50...122...140 lightning damage and become blinded for 3...10...12 seconds.
For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a skill, that party member gains 45...97...110 Health.
If this attack hits, it deals +5...21...25 damage and sets target foe on Fire [sic]  for 1...3...3 second[s].
For 8 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot also causes Weakness for 1...13...16 second[s].

For 20 seconds, if target non-spirit ally hits a foe with more Health than that ally, that foe is set on Fire [sic] for 1...3...3 second[s]. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each party member within earshot also causes Burning for 1...3...3 second[s].
You lose all adrenaline and target other ally gains 1...3...4 strikes of adrenaline.

Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack. When this spirit prevents damage, it loses 75...51...45 Health. This spirit lasts 30...54...60 seconds.
Target foe and all nearby foes take 10...54...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item, you gain 10 Energy.
For 5...17...20 seconds, all of your spirits within earshot deal 5...17...20 less damage and steal 5...17...20 Health when they attack.
You lose 1 Dervish enchantment and gain 10...42...50 Health. If an enchantment is lost in this way, you cannot be blocked, you strike twice, and you gain an additional 10...58...70 Health.
For 5...17...20 seconds, target ally gains 5...41...50% more adrenaline and 1 Energy whenever that ally successfully hits with an attack.
For 10 seconds, the next time an ally within earshot would take fatal damage, that damage is negated and that ally is healed for 20...164...200 Health. Angelic Bond ends on all other allies.
All nearby foes are struck for 10...34...40 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes have Cracked Armor for 1...8...10 second[s].
If this attack hits, you deal +5...17...20 damage and target foe is Dazed for 4...9...10 seconds. This attack has melee range.
For 4...9...10 seconds, all allies within earshot move 33% faster, and gain 5...13...15 Health while moving.
If this attack hits, it deals +5...17...20 damage, and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked. All of your non-spear attack skills are disabled for 3 seconds.
Hold Lee Sa's ashes for 5...13...15 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you gain +2 Energy regeneration. When you drop her ashes, you gain +1...8...10 Energy.
For 15 seconds, whenever you attack a foe with your scythe, you deal 10...22...25 slashing damage to all adjacent foes.
All adjacent foes are struck for 10...34...40 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...3...4 second[s].
For 20 seconds, you have +40...88...100 maximum Health. When this enchantment ends, you are healed for 75...175...200 Health.

For 10...74...90 seconds, you gain +20 armor against physical damage, you gain adrenaline 25% faster, your attacks deal holy damage, and whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, nearby foes are set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s]. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes are struck for 5...41...50 piercing damage. For 5...21...25 seconds you take 5...29...35% less damage from spells.

For 10...74...90 seconds, your Dervish enchantments recharge 50% faster and your attacks deal chaos damage. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, steal 1 Energy from all nearby foes. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

For 10...74...90 seconds, you have +150 Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, all party members in earshot lose 1 condition. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

For 10...74...90 seconds, your scythe attacks deal dark damage, and steal 0...10...12 Health. You are immune to Disease, and inflict Disease on all adjacent foes for 3 seconds whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
For 5...13...15 seconds, you move 25% faster and take half damage. Dark Escape ends if you successfully hit with an attack.
If Fierce Blow hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If target foe was [sic] suffering from Weakness, that foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for 1...7...8 second[s].
If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...10...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.
If it hits, this attack always results in a critical hit.
